trends: There have been 19 other sightings in Albany
There were no other sightings in Albany on or around May 22nd 2009
Summary: Object was like a mirror with a dark outline around it. Outlining a tubular shape.
divs: sighting detailsit was a partly cloudly day with wind high up.the clouds were at two levels with the lower level moving from the north to the south .i was at work and just came back from lunch .we were geting ready to make a heavy lift with a crane.i was looking the rigging over when i looked up at the crane hook whitch was hanging in mid air with rigging on it when i saw a black cloud was moving east to west against the wind whitch i thought was very odd.after looking at it for about two minutes i realized that it was a shadow not a cloud then i looked just to my left when i saw an object that was in between the levels of clouds moving east to west against the wind.the object was very very large.it had a mirror finish to it.it was very long with slitly rounded ends.i watched the objsct for about 15 minnutes when i turned my attention back to my work.the object was moving over the albany county airport.i would be very intersted to know if other people reported seeing this object on 5\22\09.
